data.name: MigrateConnectionsToWorkbenchInfoMoreInfo
data.value:
{0} now works with the connections file used by MySQL Workbench if it is installed.
{0} will attempt to merge all existing connections with MySQL Workbench and in order to do this MySQLWorkbench must not be running.
Please make sure MySQL Workbench is closed to continue with the merging operation. If you choose not to migrate connections now, you will be prompted later to perform the migration.

data.name: UnableToMergeConnectionsErrorMoreInfo
data.value:

{0} attempted to merge all existing connections with MySQL Workbench but is unable to do that if MySQLWorkbench is running.
Please close MySQL Workbench and restart {0} to perform the merge.

data.name: ConnectionInsecureError
data.value: The MySQL server is using SSL and requires a secure connection, but the client connection has SSL turned off.

data.name: ConnectionIsInsecureAndRequiresRsaKeyRetrievalDetail
data.value: This connection is not set to use SSL, but the MySQL server requires a secure connection.

data.name: ConnectionIsInsecureAndRequiresRsaKeyRetrievalError
data.value: Retrieval of the RSA public key is not enabled for insecure connections

data.name: ConnectionIsInsecureAndRequiresRsaKeyRetrievalMoreInfo
data.value:
The MySQL server is using SSL and it requires a secure connection from the client. This connection is explicitly turning off the use of SSL (Use SSL = No).
It is advised that the connection is set to use the "Preferred" or "Required" SSL mode in order to connect to this server.
If, for some reason, using SSL is not an option, the password can still be sent to the server after encrypting it with a RSA key. The client can request the public key from the server, however this could be prone to man-in-the-middle attacks. You need to ensure the server is trusted.
This is not the recommended option; it is better to use SSL with a "Preferred" or "Required" mode.

data.name: ConnectionIsInsecureAndRequiresRsaKeyRetrievalSubDetail
data.value: Do you trust the server to send an RSA key to encrypt the password?

data.name: ConnectionIsInsecureAndRequiresRsaKeyRetrievalTitle
data.value: The MySQL server requires a secure connection
